Returns: true if the specified context can draw on top of other apps, false otherwise
canDrawOverlays(android.content.Context).Description: Checks if the specified context can draw on top of other apps. As of API level 23, an app cannot draw on top of other apps unless it declares the @B_android#Manifest#permission#SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW_E@ permission in its manifest, and the user specifically grants the app this capability. To prompt the user to grant this approval, the app must send an intent with the action @B_android#provider#Settings#ACTION_MANAGE_OVERLAY_PERMISSION_E@, which causes the system to display a permission management screen.

ClassDesc: The Settings provider contains global system-level device preferences.
